description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting "See Game Manual"  * 100+ Leagues & Teams: NRL, Super League, Cooperative Championships, NSW & QLD cups, Toyota Cup, Rep teams, Australian, England and New Zealand Internationals.  * Dynamic Tackling System: Fend and break tackle your way past multiple defenders.  * Create, Customise and Share: Players and teams in Footy Factory. Double-Barrelled Experts: Commentary from Andrew Voss and Phil ‘Gus’ Gould.  * 34 High Detail Stadia: From Australia, New Zealand and the UK.  * 10-Year Career Mode: Sign sponsors, hire top flight coaching staff, negotiate player contracts and set player training programs & intensity to build the ultimate team.  * Competitive or Co-operative: Multiplayer matches with up to 8 players (4 aside) online.  * Experience System: Earn badges and experience both online and off to rise to the top of the leaderboards.  * Tactical Passing: Perform defensive or attacking passes to best exploit your opponents  * Spectacular High Ball Catching: Soar high to catch or tap the ball to team mates.
description.short: Rugby League Live 2 features: 100+ Leagues & Teams, Dynamic Tackling System, Create, Customise and Share players and teams, Expert commentary from Andrew Voss and Phil Gould, 34 High Detail Stadia, 10-Year Career Mode, Competitive or Co-operative game play, Experience System, Tactical Passing,  Spectacular High Ball Catching and much much more.

media.title: Rugby League Live 2
media.edition: Original, Game of the Year Edition
